item.description:
Maddy’s Lounge
1639 Broadway
Rte 1 so/ Rte 99
Saugus, MA

...Sept 11th, Re-Opening of Maddy's Lounge with DJ JODI. 3:00 pm - 8:00 pm

We will be celebrating with a complimentary Kowloons buffet, FREE Raffle tickets to win some great gifts and gift cards and we will be doing a 50/50 raffle where all proceeds will go to The September 11 Fund.

We will have DJ JODI as our SPECIAL GUEST DJ in the club at this event mixing her tunes, while Connie will be singing away doing her KARAOKE in the Lounge.

THE HIDE AWAY will NOT be opened due to this celebration. It will re-open the following Saturday,

• Free Parking
• 21+, Proper I.D. required
• Hi Def TV (Sports Channel)
• Plenty of seating
• Great FOOD
• HUGE dance floor
• Premium Liquor
• KENO
• $10.00 cover charge
• Pleasant lounge area (separate room)
Any questions email BlushBoston@yahoo.com
or www.BlushBoston.com
item.name: RE - OPENING OF MADDY'S LOUNGE
